biotools.summary: Phenotype-tissue expression and exploration (PTEE) resource facilitates the choice of tissue for RNA-seq-based clinical genetics studies. PTEE is an interactive web application for finding the best accessible tissues for RNA sequence analysis.

bioschemas.name: PTEE
